@graph.name: Advanced Route Export - GPS Data Export for Navigation Devices - Route4Me
@graph.description: Export Route4Me routes to Garmin, TomTom, and Magellan devices with our Advanced Data Export add-on. Customize file formats for offline navigation without internet connectivity.
@graph.keywords: route export, GPS device integration, offline navigation, Garmin export, TomTom export, Magellan export, KML export, GPX export, route data conversion, navigation device compatibility, file format conversion, memory card routes, multi-stop navigation, GPS file format, device integration

@graph.name: Advanced Route Export for Navigation Devices
@graph.description: The Advanced Data Export add-on automatically exports your Route4Me data into popular file formats for routing, mapping, navigation, and dispatch systems. You can customize exported file formats by resequencing columns and removing unnecessary ones.

additionalProperty.name: Supported File Formats
additionalProperty.value: KML (Google Earth, Google Maps), GPX/GPXX (Garmin), FRESHROUTE/ASC (Navigon), ITN (TomTom), FPI (Fugawi), LMX (Nokia Maps), TSX (Tiled Map Editor), UPD (text documents)

additionalProperty.name: Compatible Devices
additionalProperty.value: Garmin, Magellan, TomTom, and Navigon 5/6 navigation devices

additionalProperty.name: Export Features
additionalProperty.value: Column resequencing, unnecessary field removal, memory card export

@graph.name: Request Information
@graph.description: Contact our team to learn more about implementing Advanced Route Export for your navigation devices

@graph.name: Supported File Formats
@graph.value: KML (Google Earth), GPX/GPXX (Garmin), FRESHROUTE/ASC (Navigon), ITN (TomTom), FPI (Fugawi), LMX (Nokia Maps), TSX (Tiled Map Editor), UPD (text documents)

@graph.name: Compatible Navigation Devices
@graph.value: Garmin GPS, Magellan GPS, TomTom GPS, Navigon 5, Navigon 6, Nokia Maps compatible devices

@graph.name: Internet Connectivity
@graph.value: Only required for initial export; drivers require no internet connectivity for navigation

@graph.name: Integration Method
@graph.value: Memory card export for physical navigation devices, direct file export for software applications

@graph.name: Customization Options
@graph.value: Column resequencing, unnecessary field removal, format-specific optimizations for each device type
